title: Bannon to Garland over Jan. 6 hearings: Indict Trump and we'll impeach you
description: CNN's Jeffrey Toobin reacts after Steve Bannon, who once served as former President Donald Trump's chief strategist, threatened Attorney General Merrick Garland in response to the January 6 committee hearings.

title: Concerns of gun fire lead to scare during March for Our Lives event
description: Police detained an individual who "interfered" with the event, but said no weapons were involved.

title: CNN goes inside rebranded McDonald's restaurant in Russia
description: Russia has relaunched McDonald's under new branding and ownership. CNN's Fred Pleitgen visited Moscow's Pushkinskaya Square, the same location where McDonald's first opened in Russia in 1990.

title: 'That's not a yes': Dana Bash asks AOC about Biden endorsement
description: CNN's Dana Bash questions Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (D-NY) on her stance on President Joe Biden saying he will run for reelection in 2024.

title: As survivors demand action, Senate gun law negotiators draw closer to deal
description:
• The aftermath of another deadly weekend in the US
• Student-led rallies calling for action on gun violence held in 400 US cities

title: How a SCOTUS opinion in a blockbuster case could impact abortion rights
description: Within weeks, the Supreme Court will issue an opinion in a blockbuster abortion case that will give the conservative majority the opportunity to reverse the court precedent enshrining a right to the procedure.

title: Paramedic from Utah bought a one-way ticket to Ukraine when Russia invaded. Now she's helping to keep other foreign fighters alive
description: Driving down bumpy, dirt roads, local police escort us into a wooded area where they say a unit of foreign fighters is based. It's a village like so many in this part of Ukraine -- homes destroyed and visible signs of shelling.

title: Rebranded McDonald's restaurants are unveiled in Russia
description: The golden arches and Big Mac may have gone, but Russians saw McDonald's restaurants reopen on Sunday under new branding and ownership.

title: Trump has become more popular since the January 6 Capitol attack
The aftermath of another deadly weekend in the US
Russian forces could cut off Severodonetsk in days. In neighboring Bakhmut, residents brace for their arrival
description: At first glance Bakhmut doesn't look like a city at war.

title: Max Verstappen wins Azerbaijani F1 Grand Prix
description: Max Verstappen cruised to victory at the Azerbaijan Grand Prix on Sunday to extend his lead at the top of the Formula One drivers' championship to 21 points.

title: 'Inundated with American travelers': End of testing rule opens travel floodgates
'This was once someone's home': Life in Kyiv suburbs
description: CNN's Salma Abdelaziz reports on cleanup efforts in the suburbs of Kyiv, Ukraine, as Russia's invasion continues.

title: Golfer wins $4m for playing just three rounds of golf
description: South African Charl Schwartzel won the inaugural individual stroke-play competition of the controversial Saudi-backed LIV Golf Invitational Series on Saturday.

title: A rare virus has left one side of Justin Bieber's face paralyzed
China blasts US 'bully,' says it will 'fight to the end' for Taiwan
Russian President Vladimir Putin reveals what his endgame is in Ukraine
Seoul to "dramatically" boost defense amid fears over North Korea's nuclear plans
description: South Korea will "dramatically" strengthen its defensive capabilities, its defense minister said Sunday amid international concern that Pyongyang is reviving its nuclear testing program.

title: Their records were locked in limestone caves during the pandemic. Now they're suing the US government
description: It sounds like a scenario from another era.

title: China blasts US 'bully,' says it will 'fight to the end' for Taiwan
description:
• US defense chief says China muscling neighbors, plundering resources in Pacific
• Why Chinese warplanes are 'playing chicken' with US allies — and why they're doing it now

title: 'Inundated with American travelers': End of testing rule opens floodgates
description: • What to know about the new US travel policy

title: The Ukrainian landmarks being preserved from Russian attack
description: A blown-up Russian tank near Kyiv, a monument for Ukrainian writer Borys Hrinchenko, an apartment building destroyed by artillery and a slide in a children's playground covered in graffiti.

title: US President Joe Biden running out of options as Iran closer than ever to nuclear weapon
Transforming an A330 into a yacht-like luxury experience
description: The fact that the mega rich go to great lengths to customize their private planes to fit their lifestyles is not new.

title: A teen girl in Japan was stabbed to death by her grandfather in a case that shocked the nation. He says he doesn't remember
Migrant caravan of almost 7,000 people granted permission to stay in Mexico
description: Mexican immigration authorities have dissolved a caravan of almost 7,000 people that had departed the southern city of Tapachula and was headed to Mexico City, according to a statement released on Saturday by the Mexican National Institute of Migration (INM).
